name: NEHotspotConfigurationManager
desc: A manager that applies and removes hotspot configurations of Wi-Fi networks.

items.name: class var shared: NEHotspotConfigurationManager
items.desc: Instantiates NEHotspotConfigurationManager as a singleton, so it can be shared.

items.name: func apply(NEHotspotConfiguration, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds or updates a Wi-Fi network configuration after prompting the user for permission, and then attempts to join the network under certain conditions.

items.name: func getConfiguredSSIDs(completionHandler: ([String]) -> Void)
items.desc: Returns the SSIDs or the names of the Wi-Fi hotspot domains that your app has configured and invokes an optional completion handler.

items.name: func removeConfiguration(forHS20DomainName: String)
items.desc: Removes a Wi-Fi hotspot configuration, identified by a Hotspot 2.0 domain name, that your app previously added.

items.name: func removeConfiguration(forSSID: String)
items.desc: Removes a Wi-Fi configuration, identified by an SSID, that your app previously added.

items.name: let NEHotspotConfigurationErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The domain string for errors involving hotspot configuration.

items.name: enum NEHotspotConfigurationError
items.desc: Error values returned by hotspot configuration manager methods.
